sentences.en: Causes Poor diet, sluggish metabolism, stress, a hormonal imbalance, and sometimes infection.
sentences.cn: 问题起因:饮食不良, 新陈代谢缓慢, 压力, 荷尔蒙分泌失调, 或许还有感染.

sentences.en: Evolution of the hormonal system is a paramount part of biological ascension.
sentences.cn: 荷尔蒙系统的进化,是生物体提升的至关重要一部分.

sentences.en: Hormonal aspects of passivity and aggressiveness in boys.
sentences.cn: 研究男孩身上的消极以及积极的荷尔蒙问题.

sentences.en: Hormonal Contraception and False - Positive Cervical Cytology: Is There an Association?
sentences.cn: 激素避孕与宫颈细胞学检查假阳性: 两者之间存在关联 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hormonal imbalances can be remedied, and psychological problems resolved.
sentences.cn: 荷尔蒙失衡问题,可以弥补, 心理问题解决.

sentences.en: Hormonal Problems an under or over active thyroid?
sentences.cn: 激素的原因——你的甲状腺分泌过于活跃或是过于少量 吗 ?

sentences.en: Lavender and tea - tree were found to cause hormonal disruptions by mimicking oestrogen.
sentences.cn: 有人发现,薰衣草与茶树会通过模拟雌激素来产生荷尔蒙紊乱.

sentences.en: Maintenance of tear film requires an intricate nervous and hormonal regulation.
sentences.cn: 泪膜的稳定需要精细的神经、激素调控.

sentences.en: Objective To study hormonal level changes of rats after spinal cord injury.
sentences.cn: 目的研究大鼠脊髓损伤后生殖激素水平的改变.

sentences.en: Red Clover ( trifolium pretense ) helps restore and balance hormonal function.
sentences.cn: 恢复和平衡内分泌功能和子宫孕育.

sentences.en: She underwent surgical intervention and a subsequent short period of hormonal therapy.
sentences.cn: 他接受外科手术及随后短暂荷尔蒙治疗.

sentences.en: Some viral diseases are more severe during pregnancy, probably tecause of hormonal changes.
sentences.cn: 有些病毒病在妊娠期间比较严重, 可能是由于激素变化引起的.

sentences.en: Stress will start hormonal action, which can induce acne inflammation.
sentences.cn: 应激激素将开始行动, 这可引起痤疮炎症.

sentences.en: The endogenous hormonal ratio was interdependent to the microspore abortion of radish.
sentences.cn: 可见,萝卜小孢子的败育与内源激素平衡的破坏有关.

sentences.en: The researchers evaluated hormonal and metabolic profiles and cardiopulmonary and exercise parameters.
sentences.cn: 研究人员评估荷尔蒙和新陈代谢概况以及心肺功能和运动参数.

trans.tran_cn: 激素的，荷尔蒙的，生理的
trans.tran_en: Hormonal means relating to or involving hormones
